## RouteValidatorConfig interface

The configuration object to the RouteValidator class. Set `params`<!-- -->, `query` and/or `body` to specify the validation logic to follow for that property.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface RouteValidatorConfig<P, Q, B> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [body?](./opensearch-dashboards.routevalidatorconfig.body.md) | [RouteValidationSpec](./opensearch-dashboards.routevalidationspec.md)<!-- -->&lt;B&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> Validation logic for the body payload |
|  [params?](./opensearch-dashboards.routevalidatorconfig.params.md) | [RouteValidationSpec](./opensearch-dashboards.routevalidationspec.md)<!-- -->&lt;P&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> Validation logic for the URL params |
|  [query?](./opensearch-dashboards.routevalidatorconfig.query.md) | [RouteValidationSpec](./opensearch-dashboards.routevalidationspec.md)<!-- -->&lt;Q&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> Validation logic for the Query params |
